channel.title: Changing amount of XP from a NPC!
channel.description: How do change the amount of XP i get from attacking something and killing something??[br][size=1]Posted on: June 20, 2007, 12:19:07 AM[/size][hr]where do i change the amount of XP i get from attacking a NPC, i've already changed the dummies but cant figure out where to edit the NPCS and how[br][size=1]Posted on: June 20, 2007, 12:49:44 AM[/size][hr]please any1 help? im trying to make my source as realistic as possible[br][size=1]Posted on: June 20, 2007, 01:16:39 AM[/size][hr]surely some1 knows how??
